titles.title: Federal Cloud Risk Management Improvements Act
Federal Cloud Risk Management Improvements Act
A bill to amend chapter 36 of title 44, United States Code, to require reporting regarding the security of cloud computing products and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Federal Cloud Risk Management Improvements Act
This bill requires the General Services Administration to submit to Congress a report that includes a review of measures taken under the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program, or any successor program, to ensure the security of data stored or processed by cloud service providers.
